title: His White House Run Over, Mayor de Blasio Has Big Plans at Home
text:
Days after dropping out of the presidential race, New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio huddled with dozens of City Hall staffers for a pep rally of sorts to remind them that he still had more than two years left in office.

“We have 829 days—hell of a long time,” he said during Wednesday’s 20-minute meeting behind closed doors, according to staff. He told attendees that voters around the country were in “awe” of what the city had done since he took office in 2014, and he compared his agenda to the New Deal.

...
description: Days after dropping out of the presidential race, New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio huddled with dozens of City Hall staffers for a pep rally of sorts to remind them that he still had more than two years left in office.
